title: FEATURE REQUEST - 2FA to open application
author: pir8radio
body_snippet: Encryption of the connections file is great, but I would feel even safer if I could enable 2fa to even open the application,  I don't think it needs a user/pass to login, just a function to enable something like using google authenticator or Authy,  to 2fa into the app..  I do not save login info within mRemoteNG today because if i loose my laptop, its pretty easy to get into windows.    then they have the key to my servers.

comments.snippet: that is palned for user profiles

comments.snippet:
the biggest issue tho is this needs to be made in a way that isnt pure snake oil.

TOTP (as in the algo that Google Authenticator etc generally use) only works because it is used to authenticate at remote systems which can deny giving you any data in the first place.
